summary: Overhauls the Bannered Mare to make better use of the available space
descriptionHtml:
[center][size=6][font=Century Gothic]Bannered Mare Overhaul[/font][/size][/center][center][size=4]
[/size][/center][center][size=4]Introduction:[/size][/center]
The third instalment in my shop overhaul series brings us to the first inn i've altered. I've always felt that the Bannered Mare was a bit lacking inside, there's only one bed to rent and there's not much seating for the most popular inn in Whiterun. I've changed the inn to make better use of the space that's available.

[center][size=4]Features:[/size][/center]
• Seven upstairs beds instead of the original one bed for a more “hotel” feel.
• Repositioned bar area
• Separated banquet room for the more noble diners
• A stage for Mikael to play on
• More seating and more tables

[center][size=4]Requirements:[/size][/center]
[size=2]No DLC is required for BMO to work.[/size]

[center][size=4]Installation/Uninstallation:[/size][/center]
[size=2]To install, use NMM or drag and drop the contents of the zipped folder into Skyrim's "Data" folder. Uninstallation should be OK, there's one simple script that makes certain doors close automatically. Make sure you've saved outside of the Bannered Mare before uninstalling.[/size]

[center][size=4]Conflicts:[/size][/center]
Will conflict with any mod that changes the “WhiterunBanneredMare” cell. Place the .esp higher in the load order to make other mods overwrite things in my mod, place it lower to make my mod overwrite other mods. Place just above a lighting mod (if you use one) to keep the changes made by your lighting mod, and under it if you don't want the changes (ELFX makes Bannered Mare very laggy in my game, just FYI).

[center][size=4]My Other Mods:[/size][/center]
If you like this shop overhaul then you'll love my other mods:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54143/?]Radiant Raiment Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54398/?]Warmaidens Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57505/?]Riverwood Trader Overhaul[/url]
author: naverd01
